description: Get products without key attributes. (For cross boarder sellers Only)

query.name: attribute_tag
query.description: The tag of attributes. Currently only has one value "key_prop" 属性标示。当前只支持key_prop

query.name: page_size
query.description: The number of Products you would like to fetch from every response. The max number is 50. 返回的最大商品量。最大值50。商品级别

query.name: language_code
query.description: Multi-language of category attributes that need to be returned

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/product/unfilled/attribute/get')
request.add_api_parameter("page_index", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("attribute_tag", "key_prop")
request.add_api_parameter("page_size", "50")
request.add_api_parameter("language_code", "en_us")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/product/unfilled/attribute/get')
request.add_api_param('page_index', '1')
request.add_api_param('attribute_tag', 'key_prop')
request.add_api_param('page_size', '50')
request.add_api_param('language_code', 'en_us')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

schema.name: total_products
schema.description: The current product volume returned. Commodity level
